title: Rusty

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, linger outside someone's house, scaring off all visitors.
 - On full moons, you learn of all players you scared off, and their roles. Choose one to attack with your wrench, dealing a basic attack and cleaning them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When roleblocked, you attack and clean your roleblocker.
- Starting on night 4, each night you will attack the player whose house you stand outside of (in addition to attacking a visitor every full moon), and your attacks are upgraded to powerful.

desc:
Post 5274
*You hear the muffled sound of heavy breathing. This sound can't be coming from a throat; the breathing sounds like rust scraping off of steel.*
